content: I think I'll go with a vanilla scented gift set. It seems like a more comforting and calming scent that will provide a nice contrast to the boldness of the silver necklace. Plus, it's a more subtle scent, which I think my sister will appreciate. Do you think I should consider getting a gift set that includes a scented candle, bath salts, and body lotion, or would just a candle and body lotion be enough?
